    (ii) OOU requires English Language and three (3) other 
subjects from History, Geography/Physics, Religious 
Studies, French and Literature in English.   
(i) EBSU  and  CALABAR  require 
 Christian  Religious  
Studiesand two (2) other Arts subjects.  
(ii) TASUED requires English Language and any other subjects 
in Arts or Social Sciences.  
(iii) BENIN accepts any three (3) subjects.  
(iv) LAGOS accepts Christian Religious Studies and any two (2) 
of Literature inEnglish, History/Government, French, 
Geography, Mathematic s, any Nigerian Language, 
Economics/Commerce.
